actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the Senate that a quorum of the House is present and that the House is ready to proceed with business.

summary.text: Informs the Senate that a quorum of the House is assembled.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the Senate that a quorum of the House is present and that the House is ready to proceed with business.
